short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BigBen Monitor tracks web page changes automatically. We will notify you when the page changes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BigBen Monitor tracks webpage changes automatically.  It will notify you if the webpage updates. 
Selecting the content of a web page is very easy. You can choose an area of the webpage to detect the specific location of the page or use a CSS selector to detect the page's specific content.

For example, you can use the BigBen Monitor to:
- Track the COVID-19 vaccine availability in your country.
- Track the change of price.
- Check the ticket availability.

Features:
- Refresh the web page to detect its changes.
- Add pages with two steps.
- Custom time interval.
- Select the area of the web page you want to monitor
- Select the CSS selector of the web page
- Alert you when the page changes
